title: Enhancing the performance of heterogeneous palladium based catalysts in the mild reductive depolymerization of Soda lignin through addition of a non-noble metal and tuning of the preparation strategy
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00054D, Paper

Tibo De Saegher, Boyana Atanasova, Pieter Vermeir, Kevin M. Van Geem, Jeriffa De Clercq, An Amandine Verberckmoes, Jeroen Lauwaert
Research towards mild reductive depolymerization of lignin is gaining momentum because of its potential for producing sustainable functionalized aromatics, but achieving high yields still relies on expensive noble metal catalysts....
